title: Celso Otero
text:
Celso Otero Quintás (born 1 February 1958) is a Uruguayan <a href="association%20football">football</a> coach and former player. He most recently was the assistant manager of <a href="Uruguay%20national%20football%20team">Uruguay national team</a>.
He has played for Uruguay national team once, in a friendly against <a href="Colombia%20national%20football%20team">Colombia</a> on 7 August 1988. He was also part of Uruguay's <a href="1986%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1986 FIFA World Cup</a> squad.
